statements: SELECT * FROM landmarks;
SELECT landmark_name, latitude, longitude FROM landmarks ORDER BY landmark_name DESC;
SELECT landmark_name, elevation FROM landmarks WHERE elevation > 1000;
SELECT landmark_name, date_built FROM landmarks WHERE date_built IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(latitude) AS avg_lat, AVG(longitude) AS avg_long FROM landmarks;
SELECT * FROM landmarks ORDER BY date_built DESC, landmark_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT landmark_name, latitude, longitude FROM landmarks WHERE elevation > 1000 ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT landmark_name, elevation, date_built FROM landmarks WHERE date_built BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 45.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -100.0 AND -95.0;
SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(elevation) FROM landmarks GROUP BY date_built HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY AVG(elevation) DESC;
SELECT * FROM Landmarks;
SELECT name, location FROM Landmarks ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Tours WHERE duration > '2 hours';
SELECT name, start_time, end_time FROM Tours WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, year_built FROM Landmarks WHERE year_built >= 1800 ORDER BY year_built DESC;
SELECT name, location, year_built FROM Landmarks ORDER BY year_built DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Landmarks WHERE year_built < 1900;
SELECT name, location, description FROM Landmarks WHERE year_built BETWEEN 1800 AND 1950 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT L.name, L.location, T.duration FROM Landmarks L INNER JOIN Tours T ON L.id = T.landmark_id WHERE T.duration > '1 hour' ORDER BY T.duration DESC;
SELECT name, location, year_built FROM Landmarks WHERE description LIKE '%historic%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM landmarks ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name FROM landmarks WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, name, ST_AsText(location) AS location FROM landmarks WHERE ST_DistanceSphere(location, ST_GeogPoint(40.7128, -74.0060)) < 10000;
SELECT * FROM tours WHERE landmarks_visited @> '{1, 3}';
SELECT username, ST_AsText(location) AS location FROM users WHERE ST_DWithin(location, ST_GeogPoint(51.5074, -0.1278), 10000);
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM landmarks WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM tours WHERE landmarks_visited @> ARRAY[1, 2] ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, tour_name FROM tours WHERE id > 5 AND tour_name LIKE '%Adventure%';
SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE ST_DWithin(location, 'POINT(0 0)', 1000);
SELECT * FROM landmarks;
SELECT name, location FROM landmarks WHERE year_built > 1800;
SELECT * FROM categories ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM categories WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, duration FROM tours WHERE duration < 120;
SELECT name, location, year_built FROM landmarks;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE description LIKE '%historic%';
SELECT l.name, c.name FROM landmarks l JOIN landmark_categories lc ON l.id = lc.landmark_id JOIN categories c ON c.id = lc.category_id;
SELECT t.name, t.duration, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tours t JOIN landmarks l ON t.duration > 60 GROUP BY t.name, t.duration;
SELECT name, description FROM tours ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT landmark_name, location_geog FROM landmarks;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_name = 'Historical';
SELECT tour_name, distance FROM tours ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM tours_landmarks WHERE sequence = 1;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) FROM categories GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM landmarks;
SELECT landmark_name, location_geog FROM landmarks ORDER BY landmark_name ASC;
SELECT tour_name, start_location_geog, distance FROM tours WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT l.landmark_name, c.category_name FROM landmarks l JOIN landmarks_categories lc ON l.landmark_id = lc.landmark_id JOIN categories c ON lc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT tour_name, end_location_geog, duration FROM tours WHERE duration > 120 ORDER BY duration ASC;
